main_definition: Relating to or characteristic of a royal family, typically referring to the highest rank in society associated with monarchies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to royalty or members of a royal family
meanings_and_examples.example: The castle was adorned with regal decorations befitting its royal inhabitants.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Of the highest rank, status, or quality
meanings_and_examples.example: Her jewelry collection included many exquisite and truly royal gems.
Their restaurant is known for its royal dining experience with top-notch service and exceptional cuisine.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Of or relating to a king, queen, prince, princess, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: The royal wedding was broadcasted live around the world, captivating audiences everywhere.
The palace's architecture is truly royal in its grandeur and splendor.
